013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016
017import java.util.*;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
021
022/**
023 * Describes the operations available on a single path.
024 *
025 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
026 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../index.html#jrs.OpenApi">Overview &gt; juneau-rest-server &gt; OpenAPI</a>
027 * </ul>
028 */
029@Bean(properties="summary,description,get,put,post,delete,options,head,patch,trace,servers,parameters,*")
030@FluentSetters
031public class PathItem extends OpenApiElement {
032
033   private String summary, description;
034   private Operation get, put, post, delete, options, head, patch, trace;
035   private List<Server> servers;
036   private List<Parameter> parameters;
037
038   /**
039    * Default constructor.
040    */
041   public PathItem() {}
042
043   /**
044    * Copy constructor.
045    *
046    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
047    */
048   public PathItem(PathItem copyFrom) {
049      super(copyFrom);
050      this.summary = copyFrom.summary;
051      this.description = copyFrom.description;
052      this.get = copyFrom.get;
053      this.put = copyFrom.put;
054      this.post = copyFrom.post;
055      this.delete = copyFrom.delete;
056      this.options = copyFrom.options;
057      this.head = copyFrom.head;
058      this.patch = copyFrom.patch;
059      this.trace = copyFrom.trace;
060      this.servers = copyOf(copyFrom.servers);
061      this.parameters = copyOf(copyFrom.parameters);
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * Returns the summary.
066    *
067    * @return The summary.
068    */
069   public String getSummary() {
070      return summary;
071   }
072
073   /**
074    * Sets the summary.
075    *
076    * @param value The new value for this property.
077    * @return This object.
078    */
079   public PathItem setSummary(String value) {
080      this.summary = value;
081      return this;
082   }
083
084   /**
085    * Returns the description.
086    *
087    * @return The description.
088    */
089   public String getDescription() {
090      return description;
091   }
092
093   /**
094    * Sets the description.
095    *
096    * @param value The new value for this property.
097    * @return This object.
098    */
099   public PathItem setDescription(String value) {
100      this.description = value;
101      return this;
102   }
103
104   /**
105    * Returns the GET operation.
106    *
107    * @return The GET operation.
108    */
109   public Operation getGet() {
110      return get;
111   }
112
113   /**
114    * Sets the GET operation.
115    *
116    * @param value The new value for this property.
117    * @return This object.
118    */
119   public PathItem setGet(Operation value) {
120      this.get = value;
121      return this;
122   }
123
124   /**
125    * Returns the PUT operation.
126    *
127    * @return The PUT operation.
128    */
129   public Operation getPut() {
130      return put;
131   }
132
133   /**
134    * Sets the PUT operation.
135    *
136    * @param value The new value for this property.
137    * @return This object.
138    */
139   public PathItem setPut(Operation value) {
140      this.put = value;
141      return this;
142   }
143
144   /**
145    * Returns the POST operation.
146    *
147    * @return The POST operation.
148    */
149   public Operation getPost() {
150      return post;
151   }
152
153   /**
154    * Sets the POST operation.
155    *
156    * @param value The new value for this property.
157    * @return This object.
158    */
159   public PathItem setPost(Operation value) {
160      this.post = value;
161      return this;
162   }
163
164   /**
165    * Returns the DELETE operation.
166    *
167    * @return The DELETE operation.
168    */
169   public Operation getDelete() {
170      return delete;
171   }
172
173   /**
174    * Sets the DELETE operation.
175    *
176    * @param value The new value for this property.
177    * @return This object.
178    */
179   public PathItem setDelete(Operation value) {
180      this.delete = value;
181      return this;
182   }
183
184   /**
185    * Returns the OPTIONS operation.
186    *
187    * @return The OPTIONS operation.
188    */
189   public Operation getOptions() {
190      return options;
191   }
192
193   /**
194    * Sets the OPTIONS operation.
195    *
196    * @param value The new value for this property.
197    * @return This object.
198    */
199   public PathItem setOptions(Operation value) {
200      this.options = value;
201      return this;
202   }
203
204   /**
205    * Returns the HEAD operation.
206    *
207    * @return The HEAD operation.
208    */
209   public Operation getHead() {
210      return head;
211   }
212
213   /**
214    * Sets the HEAD operation.
215    *
216    * @param value The new value for this property.
217    * @return This object.
218    */
219   public PathItem setHead(Operation value) {
220      this.head = value;
221      return this;
222   }
223
224   /**
225    * Returns the PATCH operation.
226    *
227    * @return The PATCH operation.
228    */
229   public Operation getPatch() {
230      return patch;
231   }
232
233   /**
234    * Sets the PATCH operation.
235    *
236    * @param value The new value for this property.
237    * @return This object.
238    */
239   public PathItem setPatch(Operation value) {
240      this.patch = value;
241      return this;
242   }
243
244   /**
245    * Returns the TRACE operation.
246    *
247    * @return The TRACE operation.
248    */
249   public Operation getTrace() {
250      return trace;
251   }
252
253   /**
254    * Sets the TRACE operation.
255    *
256    * @param value The new value for this property.
257    * @return This object.
258    */
259   public PathItem setTrace(Operation value) {
260      this.trace = value;
261      return this;
262   }
263
264   /**
265    * Returns the servers list.
266    *
267    * @return The servers list.
268    */
269   public List<Server> getServers() {
270      return servers;
271   }
272
273   /**
274    * Sets the servers list.
275    *
276    * @param value The new value for this property.
277    * @return This object.
278    */
279   public PathItem setServers(List<Server> value) {
280      this.servers = value;
281      return this;
282   }
283
284   /**
285    * Returns the parameters list.
286    *
287    * @return The parameters list.
288    */
289   public List<Parameter> getParameters() {
290      return parameters;
291   }
292
293   /**
294    * Sets the parameters list.
295    *
296    * @param value The new value for this property.
297    * @return This object.
298    */
299   public PathItem setParameters(List<Parameter> value) {
300      this.parameters = value;
301      return this;
302   }
303}
